title: Ticket #7826: Disable a needless Win32 compiler warning
description:
Some compiler warnings are so prolific, they obscure important warnings.

A prime example of this is warnings compiling on Windows re possible loss of data when converting from size_t. Yes, we should fix all of these someday, but until that day comes it would be better to simply suppress this warning so we have a chance of noticing when more important warnings show up.
remarks:
2020-Oct-19 13:23:36 by tannenba:
As this is not a user visible change, no doc/version history is desired. Resolving.
check_ins: 2020-Aug-27 13:57   Check-in [61133]: On Win32, suppress compiler warnings re conversions of size_t. #7826 (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: tannenba
